author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
In the year two-score and two,
The Bidens' taxes, just and true,
A sum of one-seventy grand,
Fulfilled their duties to the land.

To lands of Latin warmth he goes,
The Russian minister proposes,
Close bonds of friendship to embrace,
And carve a deeper bond in place.

Alas, Gen Z finds troubled times,
As in the labor market climbs,
Harsh obstacles that bar their way,
And cloud their future, doubt convey.

feedItems.title: Bidens Paid About $170,000 in Taxes for 2022
feedItems.content: The first couple reported $579,514 in adjusted gross income, slightly less than 2021.
feedItems.contentSnippet: The first couple reported $579,514 in adjusted gross income, slightly less than 2021.

feedItems.title: Russian Foreign Minister Seeks Deeper Ties in Latin America
feedItems.content: In a visit to the region, Sergei Lavrov thanked Brazil for its proposal to end the Ukraine war before flying to Venezuela, Nicaragua and Cuba.
feedItems.contentSnippet: In a visit to the region, Sergei Lavrov thanked Brazil for its proposal to end the Ukraine war before flying to Venezuela, Nicaragua and Cuba.

feedItems.title: Gen Z Faces a Tough Labor Market
feedItems.content: College students discuss their employment opportunities and job hunting.
feedItems.contentSnippet: College students discuss their employment opportunities and job hunting.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
In halls of law, the heroes brave
Against the eastern tyrants stave
A sea-born wind doth legislate
To curb the dragon's forced fate

Upon the field of labor's might
A partisan named Julie wields her light
In battles fierce, for workers joined
She earned a place among the enshrined

Of Donald Trump, one tale anew
His favor falls on Disney's crew
In storms and with the sword's alliance
Together stand 'gainst dark defiance

feedItems.title: Lawmakers Look for Tough Implementation of Forced Labor Law Targeting China
feedItems.content: U.S. lawmakers scrutinized possible loopholes in an anti-forced labor law blocking many imports from China’s Xinjiang region, expressing bipartisan support for cracking down on companies with supply chains stemming from the region.
feedItems.contentSnippet: U.S. lawmakers scrutinized possible loopholes in an anti-forced labor law blocking many imports from China’s Xinjiang region, expressing bipartisan support for cracking down on companies with supply chains stemming from the region.

feedItems.title: A Big Labor Partisan Named Julie Su
feedItems.content: Biden’s Labor nominee puts union interests above workers.
feedItems.contentSnippet: Biden’s Labor nominee puts union interests above workers.

feedItems.title: Donald Trump Sides With Disney
feedItems.content: The former President goes for woke to trash Ron DeSantis.
feedItems.contentSnippet: The former President goes for woke to trash Ron DeSantis.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
Corrections and Amplifications here,
A sacred cup from which all drinketh clear,
God's quill, a purg’ry quality we praise,
For truth and know’ledge call in sharpest rays.

Upon this page, a tale of Diamond's strife,
Where clubs of MLB lament lost gain and life,
They seek the wine that floweth from free trench,
A cup denied, partaking in mere drench.

In secret vaults, the FDIC beams,
With shadows play and auction's cunning schemes,
With Bishop's Crook their inner workings rig,
Thus, plow with mirth through land and vine of fig.

feedItems.title: Corrections & Amplifications
feedItems.content: Corrections & Amplifications for the edition of April 19, 2023.
feedItems.contentSnippet: Corrections & Amplifications for the edition of April 19, 2023.

feedItems.title: Pro Take: Diamond Sports Should Be Stripped of 'Free Lunch', MLB Clubs Say
feedItems.content: Diamond Sports Group will face off Wednesday with Major League Baseball and four of its teams, which say it has been eating a “free lunch” in chapter 11 by broadcasting games without paying for the exclusive rights.
feedItems.contentSnippet: Diamond Sports Group will face off Wednesday with Major League Baseball and four of its teams, which say it has been eating a “free lunch” in chapter 11 by broadcasting games without paying for the exclusive rights.

feedItems.title: How the FDIC Rigged the SVB Auction
feedItems.content: The agency snubbed nonbank bidders, which cost taxpayers more.
feedItems.contentSnippet: The agency snubbed nonbank bidders, which cost taxpayers more.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
In Hochul's moment, truth doth show,
Of education's flow, we know.
From higher hills, the knowledge rolls,
As rabbits run, enlivening souls.

In kidney-care, a deal doth rise,
A sum of coin, to our surprise.
As does the goat, through mount so steep,
Diaverum's worth two billion's leap.

Fox pays to hush Dominion's cry,
With fortune grand, ‘neath moonlit sky.
Like snail's retreat within its shell,
Drama closed, the defam'ry quell.

feedItems.title: Kathy Hochul's Moment of Education Truth
feedItems.content: Will she let Albany crush her bid to allow more charter schools in New York City?
feedItems.contentSnippet: Will she let Albany crush her bid to allow more charter schools in New York City?

feedItems.title: Kidney-Care Specialist Diaverum Expected to Be Sold in $2 Billion Deal
feedItems.content: Mubadala-backed M42 would buy the operator of 440 dialysis clinics from buyout firm Bridgepoint.
feedItems.contentSnippet: Mubadala-backed M42 would buy the operator of 440 dialysis clinics from buyout firm Bridgepoint.

feedItems.title: Fox to Pay $787.5 Million to Settle Dominion's Defamation Lawsuit
feedItems.content: The settlement averts a trial on the voting-machine company’s allegations that it was defamed by network broadcasts after the 2020 presidential election.
feedItems.contentSnippet: The settlement averts a trial on the voting-machine company’s allegations that it was defamed by network broadcasts after the 2020 presidential election.
